Posts.Content: Dezzie wrote: Hello I am 36 years old and I have 7 children. I   found several lumps in my breast and arm pit. The lump in my arm pit is painful. Everyone says you dont have pain with breast cancer  so don't worry about it. I have my mammogram on wednesday. I am scared and I keep reading information but I dont know I just feel down  right now depressed is more like it. Does anyone have any advice for me please. May God Bless all you!    Log in to post a reply
